```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(modelr)
library(patchwork)
source("../generate_data.R")
source("../test_utils.R")
```

### Parameters
$d=25$ nodes, $p=50$ covariates, $n=400$ observations.

```{r, include = F}
set.seed(100)
d <- 25
p <- 50
num <- 400
s <- generate_data(num, d, p, ve = 0.01, sg = 0)
lambda_g <- 1
```

### Result of CV
```{r, echo = F, fig.dim=c(13, 5)}
cv_results <- readRDS("cerealbig.out")
d <- length(cv_results)
map(cv_results, ~ cv_result_plot(.x, guides = F)) |> reduce(`+`) + 
  plot_layout(ncol = 13)
```

```{r, include = F, eval = F}
for (cvr in cv_results) {
  print(cv_result_plot(cvr))
}
```

Selected parameters:
```{r, echo = F}
tuned_params <- map(cv_results, ~.x$opt) |> reduce(cbind)
colnames(tuned_params) <- NULL
tuned_params
```

Result with selected parameters
```{r, echo = F}
result <- readRDS("bigcggr.out")
print(paste("TPR:", true_pos_rate(result$beta_mxs, s$b_mxs, s$cov_nz_idx)))
print(paste("FPR:", round(1-true_neg_rate(result$beta_mxs, s$b_mxs, s$cov_nz_idx), 3)))
```


```{r, eval = F, include = F}
compute_idx <- c(1, 1 + s$cov_nz_idx)
for (i in seq_along(s$b_mxs)) {
  cov_lbl <- paste0("component ", compute_idx[i] - 1)
  print(beta_viz_compare(result$beta_mxs[[compute_idx[i]]],
                         s$b_mxs[[i]], cov_lbl))
}
```

### Compare true positive component matrices {.tabset}
```{r, results="asis", echo = F, fig.dim=c(10, 5)}
compute_idx <- c(1, 1 + s$cov_nz_idx)
for (i in seq_along(s$b_mxs)) {
  cat("\n#### comp", compute_idx[i] - 1, "\n")
  cov_lbl <- paste0("component ", compute_idx[i] - 1)
  cat("\n")
  b <- beta_viz_compare(result$beta_mxs[[compute_idx[i]]],
                         s$b_mxs[[i]], cov_lbl)
  print(b)
  cat("\n")
}
```

### All component matrices {.tabset}
```{r, results="asis", echo = F, fig.dim=c(15, 7)}
for (i in seq(1, 41, by = 10)) {
  cat("\n#### group", i - 1, "\n")
  p <- map(result$beta_mxs[i:(i + 9)], ~ beta_viz(.x, guides = F)) |>
        reduce(`+`) +
        plot_layout(ncol = 5)
  print(p)
  cat("\n")
}
```
